channel.title: Some Commands People Might Need!

item.title: Some Commands People Might Need!
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:12, topic:509355”][quote author=Sup22211 link=topic=627603.msg4265119#msg4265119 date=1363966604]
Good, but what BASE is it? [PI], [Allstar], 600+, 700+?
[/quote]
You can tell by the format of the commands mostly.
This has cmd[0] so it’s of higher revision.

And not to be an ass, Craxx. I’m certain you ripped these from a base you downloaded. I’d say good job, but copy + paste isn’t a good job… Come up with something new.[/quote]
Wasn’t trying to be mean, i just dont know the versions so i asked him, i didn’t know cmd[0] used for higher versions

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:13, topic:509355”]Here’s some help for you, it’s a self adding item command.

Example:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("additem")) { //Change ' "additem" ' to whatever the command name shall be int[] itemsToAdd = {1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048}; //Change these IDs, and you can add more, to determine which items will be added String messageToSend = "You recieve a partyhat set!"; //Sends this message when the commands are added for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems.addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } c.sendMessage(messageToSend); }

There’s a basic item adding command. It’s convenient for people who have spawn servers.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("amountitem")) { //Change ' "amountitem" ' to whatever the command name shall be int[][] itemsToAdd = { {1038, 1}, {1040, 1}, {1042, 1}, {1044, 1}, {1046, 1}, {1048, 1}, {995, 500000000} }; //Change the first ID {id1, id2} to be the item you want to add, and the second to add an amount. String messageToSend = "You recieve a partyhat set! You also recieve 500M!"; //Sends this message when the commands are added for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems.addItem(itemsToAdd[i][0], itemsToAdd[i][1]); } c.sendMessage(messageToSend); }

This is a bit more advanced, not too much.[/quote]
Runescape, no need to make a new string you can just add the string called “messageToSend” into the sendMessage method like this
delete the String messageToSend = “You recieve a partyhat set!”;
and edit this to c.sendMessage(“You recieve a partyhat set!”);

I know you probobly know this but i just explain this to him.(craxx)

Read full topic

item.title: Some Commands People Might Need!
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Here’s some help for you, it’s a self adding item command.

Example:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("additem")) { //Change ' "additem" ' to whatever the command name shall be int[] itemsToAdd = {1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048}; //Change these IDs, and you can add more, to determine which items will be added String messageToSend = "You recieve a partyhat set!"; //Sends this message when the commands are added for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems.addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } c.sendMessage(messageToSend); }

There’s a basic item adding command. It’s convenient for people who have spawn servers.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("amountitem")) { //Change ' "amountitem" ' to whatever the command name shall be int[][] itemsToAdd = { {1038, 1}, {1040, 1}, {1042, 1}, {1044, 1}, {1046, 1}, {1048, 1}, {995, 500000000} }; //Change the first ID {id1, id2} to be the item you want to add, and the second to add an amount. String messageToSend = "You recieve a partyhat set! You also recieve 500M!"; //Sends this message when the commands are added for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems.addItem(itemsToAdd[i][0], itemsToAdd[i][1]); } c.sendMessage(messageToSend); }

This is a bit more advanced, not too much.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Commands People Might Need!
item.dc:creator: @Craxx Craxx
item.description:
@Craxx wrote:

Today I will Show you some cool and useful commands!

Open[size=18pt] Commands.java[/size]

Search for

			if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("tele") && (player.getRights() == 7)) {

And under it add any of the codes below

So this One Gives You The Coordinates Of the place you are in.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("coords")) { sendMessage("X: "+absX+" Y: "+absY+""); }

Use ::coords

This one Teleports you to staff Zone

if (playerCommand.equals("staffzone") && (c.playerRights >= 1)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2012, 4751, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Welcome to the Staffzone!"); }

Use ::staffzone

This one Adds Vote Points

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("addvp")) { player.VotePoints += 90; player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You receive a Vote Point for " + Settings.SERVER_NAME + "VoteShop."); return true; } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("runes")) { for(int r = 554; r < 567; r++) { c.getItems().addItem(r, 1000); } }

Use ::addvp

I’ll add more later.

I made this for people who needs them.

Thanks, hope I helped

Read full topic
